Articles.Content: I reset the universe by causing quantum fluctuations in space. After 13.79 BY, I rule the universe and claim the hill as my own.

I send Jebediah to find a new hill. Then, I send a H-Bomb to destroy your hill

My hill

I sit on your hill

My hill

I put C-4 underneath the hill and blow it up

my charred hill and grilled [@Kosmonaut](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/137785-kosmonaut/)

OK... calm down.

I unlock my secret time lord potential and regenerate. I then shoot you 37 times in the chest and take your hill.

My hill.

I, being part of consiglio devastations, throw a massive piece of written verbose in your general direction. Killing you and humanity, and all life on earth, and claim the newly forming asteroid ring as my own.

My asteroid ring.

I am not life, I am a sandwich.

My moderately-small-asteroid-that-I-just-claimed.

how .... no idea ....  
  
Your moderately-small-asteroid-that-you-just-claimed

My asteroid field.

Their asteroid forest,

is use the best way to spend on earth a day aka 24h

I tick inertia up a couple orders of magnitude in order to stop this nonsense.

A cannon works too.

My hill.

Hm, cannons... would fire at shorter ranges because momentum is different in higher inertia, but the speed of the projectile will still carry the same momentum after multiplying by effective mass. Yes, cannons work.

I did not take possession of the hill, I just changed physics. Mind if I join you?

Our hill.

As long as I fix physics.

WITNESS THE POWER OF NEGOTIATION.

the physics work like in star wars, none

my physics less hill

I watch the physics less hill from inside my asteroid field, many habitats are being set up, some asteroids even being linked up with sturdy elevators. I just watch, not take, I have all the asteroids I can have.

My asteroid field.
